activities: Groupon processes EEA and Swiss personal data relating to (1) employees of Groupon, Inc.'s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management, as a data controller; and (2) actual and prospective customers, merchants and other business partners of its subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland, as a data processor in accordance with instructions of Groupon, Inc.'s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland.
contacttitle1: Assistant Gen. Counsel and Chief Privacy Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Advertising Services - (ADV)Information Services - (INF)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Travel & Tourism Services - (TRA)
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
